message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go as low as $90.  I'm willing to come down to $100.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested!

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $100, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $85? I really think this product would be a great addition to my collection.
